chunk:
Le Mieux Lavender Floral Mask

Brand: Le Mieux

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Water, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Extract, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium PCA, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Allantoin, Arginine, Camellia Sinensis

, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Leaf Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Pentylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Propanediol, Ethylhexylglycerin.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
